Html:
If I have two instances of a graphlayout control displayed on a control and I have enabled highlight triggers for mouse over events I get an unhandled exception.

The crash occurs at GraphElementControl.cs line 142

        internal static void SetIsHighlighted( DependencyObject obj, bool value )
        {
            obj.SetValue( IsHighlightedPropertyKey, value );
        }

this is the exception

"'{DependencyProperty.UnsetValue}' is not a valid value for property 'BorderBrush'."

 

Has anyone else seen this, or has anyone run into issues with multiple graphlayouts?
